---
title: "Pattern Discovery with starts_with and ends_with"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tnaExtras)
library(tna)
```

## Load Data

```{r}
data(group_regulation, package = "tna")
```

## Example 1: Patterns Starting with "plan"

```{r}
result1 <- discover_patterns(group_regulation,
    type = "ngrams",
    starts_with = "plan",
    min_support = 0.1,
    max_length = 4,
    verbose = FALSE
)
print(result1)
plot(result1, type = "patterns", top_n = 15)
```

## Example 2: Patterns Ending with "consensus"

```{r}
result2 <- discover_patterns(group_regulation,
    type = "ngrams",
    ends_with = "consensus",
    min_support = 0.1,
    max_length = 4,
    verbose = FALSE
)
print(result2)
plot(result2, type = "patterns", top_n = 15)
```

## Example 3: Patterns from "plan" to "consensus"

```{r}
result3 <- discover_patterns(group_regulation,
    type = "ngrams",
    starts_with = "plan",
    ends_with = "consensus",
    min_support = 0.05,
    max_length = 5,
    verbose = FALSE
)
print(result3)
plot(result3, type = "patterns", top_n = 20)
```

## Example 4: Gapped Patterns

```{r}
result4 <- discover_patterns(group_regulation,
    type = "gapped",
    starts_with = "plan",
    min_support = 0.1,
    min_gap = 1,
    max_gap = 2,
    verbose = FALSE
)
print(result4)
plot(result4, type = "patterns", top_n = 15)
```
